fw.name: AutomationInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATScriptUtilities
class.abstract: Class to provide utility functions which simplify the use of the scripting interfaces.

method.name: ExecuteScript
method.abstract: A short-cut method which runs, from an interactive program or a macro, a function written in a scripting language synchronously.

method.name: GetScriptErrorNotification
method.abstract: Returns the name of the event event notification sent whenever a script raises an error.

method.name: GetScriptInterruptNotification
method.abstract: Returns the name of the event event notification sent whenever a script is interrupted.

method.name: GetScriptStartNotification
method.abstract: Returns the name of the event notification sent whenever a script begins its execution.

method.name: GetScriptStopNotification
method.abstract: Returns the name of the event event notification sent whenever a script stops its execution.

method.name: IsMacroPlayerOn
method.abstract: Returns true if a macro is currently being replayed.

method.name: IsMacroRecorderOn
method.abstract: Returns true if a macro is currently being recorded.

method.name: SetAutomationErrorMessage
method.abstract: Sets a custom error message which will be caught by the script engines and displayed in the UI as a replacement of the default error message ("The method XXX has failed").

class.name: CATIScriptMacrosSettingAtt
class.abstract: Interface to handle the parameters of the macros settings.

method.name: GetDefaultMacroLibraries
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of default macro libraries.

method.name: GetDefaultMacroLibrariesInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the default macro libraries setting.

method.name: GetExternalReferences
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of external references.

method.name: GetExternalReferencesInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the external references setting.

method.name: GetLanguageEditor
method.abstract: Retrieves the editor path for the specified language.

method.name: GetLanguageEditorInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the language editors setting.

method.name: SetDefaultMacroLibraries
method.abstract: Sets the list of default macro libraries.

method.name: SetDefaultMacroLibrariesLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the default macro libraries setting.

method.name: SetExternalReferences
method.abstract: Sets the list of external references.

method.name: SetExternalReferencesLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the external references setting.

method.name: SetLanguageEditor
method.abstract: Sets the editor path for the specified language.

method.name: SetLanguageEditorLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the language editors setting.
